means: 难以言喻地，因神圣而不容称呼地

sentence.Network_en: Why to always syare blankly ineffably , feel sadness namely next.
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么总是莫名的发呆,然后就是感到悲伤.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ineffable 不能说的ineffably 难以言喻地ineffaceable 不能除去的
ineffably英[in'ef bli]美[in'ef bli] 添加到我的生词本复制词条  ad. 难以形容地同反义词同: [r.] indescribably, unspeakably, unutterably.

list.abs: How is midnight baby always ineffable Jing cries to do ? What should notice ?, 半夜婴儿总是莫名的惊哭怎么办 ? 应该注意些什么?
3 after waking time , psychology always has an ineffable fear , is lose sentimental ?, 三次了每次醒了之后心理总有一丝莫名的恐惧 , 失落伤感?
ineffable joy , beauty , etc., 难以形容的喜悦 , 美丽等.
not forgetting something that is probably quite ineffable ., 不要忘记那些可能是难以言喻的东西.

entry.tran: 言语难以表达的;不可言喻的
entry.def: You use ineffable to say that something is so great or extreme that it cannot be described in words.

example.ex: ...the ineffable sadness of many of the portraits.
example.tran: 许多肖像流露出的难以形容的悲伤

sentences.sentence: "she was looking very young tonight, and, as usual, indescribably beautiful, in a simple strapless dress of a green and white silky cotton"

auth_sentence.content: Somehow, ineffably, Gary Neville wins every time.

auth_sentence.content: But it is also strangely, ineffably poignant.

auth_sentence.content: But there is something ineffably tragic about the Spain striker.
